# GitHub Sharp Theme

Two full [VSCode](https://code.visualstudio.com/) editor theme inspired by the GitHub color scheme.

Fork of [GitHub Plus](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=thenikso.github-plus-theme).
